H1.text: who has won the most superbowls as a player. Terry Bradshaw

H2.text: who has won the most superbowls as a player. Peyton Manning

H3.text: who has won the most superbowls as a player. Tom Brady

A4.text: Brady's 21 seasons as the primary starter led to seven Super Bowl titles, the most of any player and more than any NFL franchise.

A5.text: Brady extended his record for most Super Bowl wins by a player with his seventh and extended his record for Super Bowl MVP awards, with five.
